**Tender Announcement**
====================================

**Title**
--------
Class 7 Heavy Diesel Wreckers with Recovery System

**Tender Reference**
-------------------
cb-844-20864192

**Solicitation Details**
------------------------

* **Publication Date**: November 6, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: December 17, 2024 at 14:00:00 EST
* **Solicitation Number**: W6399-25-LR69/A

**Procurement Overview**
------------------------

The Department of National Defence is seeking suppliers to provide and deliver Class 7 Heavy Diesel Wreckers with Recovery System. The successful bidder will be awarded a contract for the supply of two (2) wreckers, with an optional quantity of two (2) available for National Defence for up to twelve (12) months after contract award.

**Procurement Details**
------------------------

* **Unit Quantity**: 2 (with an optional quantity of 2)
* **Delivery Location**: Petawawa
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Proposed Evaluation Criteria**: Lowest Price

**Contracting Entity**
-----------------------

The contracting entity is the Department of National Defence, located at:

101 Colonel By Drive
Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2

**Contact Information**
-------------------------

* **Name**: Matthew Yaraskovitch
* **Email**: matthew.yaraskovitch@forces.gc.ca
* **Phone**: (613) 945-2762

**Bid Documents**
-----------------

The bid documents are available for download through the Canada Buy website:

* English: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/51040/2a.-w6399-25-lr69---rfp.pdf>
* French: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/51040/2b.-w6399-25-lr69---rfp-fr.pdf>

**Submission Guidelines**
-------------------------

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
